title: Save Mayrina
content:

The Drow-Half-Elf (Mask of Revenge) will attack you, as soon as you chose any dialogue option. The other three will join the fight, so best not to talk to her.

Doing so will afflict the attacking character with Bane as if from the spell until you complete a Long Rest.
